remarks: Lemma for ~ pellex .  Arithmetical core of pellexlem3, norm upper bound.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 14-Sep-2014.)
statement: pellexlem2 $p |- ( ( ( D e. NN /\ A e. NN /\ B e. NN ) /\ ( abs ` ( ( A / B ) - ( sqrt ` D ) ) ) < ( B ^ -u 2 ) ) -> ( abs ` ( ( A ^ 2 ) - ( D x. ( B ^ 2 ) ) ) ) < ( 1 + ( 2 x. ( sqrt ` D ) ) ) ) $.
